Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: RK Group is a global SPA that manages stores and develops, produces and sells clothing, household goods, foods and other products fundamental to day-to-day life under the name of MUJI. It operates 418 stores in Japan and 404 stores in other 26 countries and regions (as of end of February 2017). The Group consists of Japan-based headquarters and 22 affiliates engaged in sales and material management. In fiscal 2016 its consolidated operating revenue was JPY 333.2 billion with a headcount of 16,195 (including 9,203 part-time employees). For more information about our business please visit the following link: https://ryohin-keikaku.jp/eng/corporate/ As a producer of wide range of products across three business lines - apparel, household goods, and food - we have an extensive and constantly growing supply chain. The Group is purchasing from approximately 200 suppliers (Business Partners) that have 800 subcontracted manufacturers located in around 20 countries including Japan, China, India, Malaysia, Taiwan, and Vietnam. Half of the suppliers are in Japan whereas the rest are mostly in Asia.
